      UnitCharacter(int origX, int origY, int health, int healthMax, java.lang.String name, UnitData data, Dialog[] dialogs)

        public UnitCharacter(int origX,
                     int origY,
                     int health,
                     int healthMax,
                     java.lang.String name,
                     UnitData data,
                     Dialog[] dialogs)
        Instantiates the unit with an initial X,Y, current & maximum health, a name, faction/loyalty data, and a list of character dialog.
        Parameters:
        origX - Original and current X of the unit
        origY - Original and current Y of the unit
        currHealth - Current health of the unit
        maxHealth - Maximum amount of health for the unit
        name - The name of the character
        data - The faction/loyalty data for the character
        dialogs - The dialogs for the character
